name: Greenwood P.I. - LD
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 35.

A noir mystery, on the rocks, with a twist.

Don the battered hat of a hard-boiled, chain-smoking, tough-as-nails private eye - as he grills the local inhabitants regarding a recent murder, along with their secrets and vices.

Created by:

Joshua Burr & Tom Jepson

Code by:

Joshua Burr

Script by:

Tom Jepson

Music by:

GrimFrenzy http://opengameart.org/content/coffee-black

Many thanks, and apologies it's not exactly as in-depth as we'd hoped.
